resources.string:
The Bucharest English Book Club, formed in February 2015, is a place where you can discuss short stories. Anybody can propose a short story. It should be no longer than 50 pages, available for free on the Internet and in English (translated or not). All the discussions are in English. It doesn't matter how fluent you are in English, if you can understand a text then you can join our meetings. A vast literary vocabulary is also not required.

 You can find our events on:
 Meetup - https://www.meetup.com/Bucharest-English-Book-Club/
 Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/groups/bucharestenglishbookclub/
 Couchsurfing - https://www.couchsurfing.com/events

Anybody can propose a short story, even if they can\'t attend a meeting. The text that you want to propose must be under 50 pages (or around that number), available in English and online for free. To propose a short story, fill out the text fields bellow. It would be great if you also have a link to the text, but leave it blank if you don\'t have one. You can check the list of the short stories discussed before in \"The Road So Far\" section.
Join the event on social media:
Feel like supporting the book club? Then all you have to do is click on some adds.
